```{r}
dispx <- function(x,t, x0=0,t0=0, v=0,a=0.1,m0=1,th=1) {
  dt <- t-t0
  dx <- x-x0
  m0 * 2^(-dt/th) * dnorm(dx, v*dt, sqrt(2*a*dt) )
}
```

```{r}
x0 <- 0; t0 <- 0; v <- 0.5; a <- 0.1; m0 <- 1; th <- 1
xlim <- c(-3,3)
nx <- 201
xvec <- seq(from=xlim[1], to=xlim[2], length=nx)
yvec <- dispx(xvec, t=0.01, x0,t0, v,a,m0,th)
plot(xvec, yvec, type="l")

```
